fn.p: Edited by: Marc H. V. Van Regenmortel, Centre National de la Recherche Scientifique (CNRS), France
Reviewed by: Ramaswamy Kalyanasundaram, University of Illinois at Chicago, United States; Salvador Iborra, Complutense University of Madrid, Spain
This article was submitted to Vaccines and Molecular Therapeutics, a section of the journal Frontiers in Immunology
